App Configuration Documentation
RTC_Timer_RTC001 App

App Documentation


The diagram shows the RTC Configuration for the App.


The table depicts the UI used for RTC configuration.

Name URI Description
RTC Enable app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwEnableRTC Enables the RTC module. Required for RTC to work. If this is enabled, hibernate domain is enabled in the CLK001 App.
Enable Time initialization once app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwTimeInitialisation If this flag is checked during initialization of RTC then the time and date will be written only once; any update of time and date will be ineffective even after power off or reset as long as RTC runs from the battery. The RTC has to be disabled in order to reprogram the initial time
User configured calendar date value app/rtc001/0/RTC001_srwDateValue Text box to enter date value for initial RTC time. The value should be entered as mm/dd/yyyy.
User configured clock time value app/rtc001/0/RTC001_srwTimeValue Text box to enter time value for initial RTC time. The value should be entered as hh:mm:ss
Event Trigger for Timer app/rtc001/0/RTC001_Eventtrigger_timer Selects if the RTC Periodic timer event generates an SCU interrupt or an NMI. If it is SCU interrupt then the signal shall be connected NVIC_SCU001 and user needs to define the interrupt handler. In the latter case, it shall be connected to EXCP001 app, and NMI handling shall be enabled in EXCP001 App
Timer Status Flag app/rtc001/0/RTC001_eroString Used for giving message on how the Periodic Timer event is handled based on the "Event Trigger for Timer" parameter.
Enable periodic seconds interrupt app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwPeriodicSecInter Enables periodic seconds interrupt
Enable periodic minutes interrupt app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwPeriodicMinInter Enables periodic minutes interrupt
Enable periodic hours interrupt app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwPeriodicHrsInter Enables periodic hours interrupt
Enable periodic days interrupt app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwPeriodicDaysInter Enables periodic days interrupt
Enable periodic months interrupt app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwPeriodicMonths Enables periodic months interrupt
Enable periodic years interrupt app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwPeriodicYears Enables periodic years interrupt
User defined interrupt handler for Periodic interrupts app/rtc001/0/RTC001_srwTimerUserFunction If the periodic timer event is used for SCU interrupt, then the user defined interrupt handler name shall be entered here.
Enable alarm interrupt app/rtc001/0/RTC001_erwAlarmIntrptEna Enables alarm interrupt. RTC module generate and alarm event when the current date and time matches the time in the alarm date and time registers.
User configured alarm date value app/rtc001/0/RTC001_srwAlarmDate Text box to enter date value for alarm configuration The value should be entered as mm/dd/yyyy.
User configured alarm time value app/rtc001/0/RTC001_srwAlarmTime Text box to enter time value for alarm configuration. The value should be entered as hh:mm:ss
Event Trigger for Alarm app/rtc001/0/RTC001_Eventtrigger_Alarm Selects if the RTC alarm event generates an SCU interrupt or an NMI. If it is SCU interrupt then the signal shall be connected NVIC_SCU001 and user needs to define the interrupt handler. In the latter case, it shall be connected to EXCP001 app and NMI handling shall be enabled in EXCP001 app.
Alarm Status Flag app/rtc001/0/RTC001_eroString1 Used for giving message on how the Periodic Timer event is handled based on the "Event Trigger for Alarm" parameter.
User defined interrupt handler for Alarm interrupts app/rtc001/0/RTC001_srwAlarmUserFunction

If the alarm event is used for SCU interrupt, then the user defined interrupt handler name shall be entered here.


The diagram shows the Hibernate Configuration in the RTC App.


The table depicts the UI used for Hibernate mode related configuration.

Name URI Description
Column1 Column2 Column3
Enable alarm event in hibernate mode RTC001_erwTimerAlarm Enables wake up from Hibernate mode on an RTC alarm event
Enable periodic seconds event in hibernate mode RTC001_erwEnaSecComp Enables wake up from Hibernate mode on an RTC periodic seconds event
Enable periodic minutes event in hibernate mode RTC001_erwEnaMinComp Enables wake up from Hibernate mode on an RTC periodic minutes event
Enable periodic hours event in hibernate mode RTC001_erwEnaHrsComp Enables wake up from Hibernate mode on an RTC periodic hours event
Enable periodic days event in hibernate mode RTC001_erwEnaDaysComp Enables wake up from Hibernate mode on an RTC periodic days
Enable periodic months event in hibernate mode RTC001_erwEnaMonthsComp Enables wake up from Hibernate mode on an RTC periodic months event
Enable periodic years event in hibernate mode RTC001_erwEnaYearsComp

Enables wake up from Hibernate mode on an RTC periodic years event


Note : Above UI parameters are used for RTC001 table generation.
